channel.title: Orical X v3 - New updates!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zNkuu.png[/img]
Hey guys, welcome to the Orical X server development thread. I know when I released v2 I said I wasn't going to make a v3, but I'm always really bored so I decided why not make a v3. As the source is pretty stable for a PI with no real stability problems, I can focus purely on contect (E.G Minigames, Skills, and Combat). I have already put forth very much effort with Orical X v2 and I expect v3 to be simply wonderful, you can see features that I have added, and features that are going to be added below. If you would like to beta test, send me an early PM! Also, I know that most cache's that are stuffed with 602 shit are fucking enormous, well I really got tried of that, and realized nobody wants to wait an hour for the cache to download, so I went and reduced the caches size from 225mb to 100mb, still big, but a [b][size=16pt]HUGE[/size][/b] improvement! Anyways, onto the good part!
Goals!: Not started-Started-Done!
Party Room Improved Agility Improved Woodcutting (now creates stumps, has correct axe showing while cutting and is alot like runescapes) Improved Fishin (Now it actually does the anim when fishing and gets the correct fish!) Added Hunter (Not the hybrid pvp shit, I'll post pictures) Added Summoning (Full BoB, full combat in multi, full following) Torva armor with effects Fixed pathfinding Fixed dropping Fixed commands Korasi spec with Anim+Gfx Cache from 225mb to 100mb!
PvP combat fixes Redo Castle Wars
Redo fight caves Dragon claws spec using events Staff of light special Full pvp armors with special attacks
Media: [/center]
[b]HUNTER!![/b]:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nOa38Z9R8ds
[b]New boss[/b]:[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T5grv2qcsI0]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T5grv2qcsI0[/url]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/U5lhX.png[/img]
[b]New home view [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SsTUQ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lcbpn.png[/img]
[center] Better graphics (Top is new, bottom is old): [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SIabz.png[/img]
Summoning (Combat, BoB, Following, Interacting): [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WSjoy.png[/img]
Tormented Demon(Sick ass view): [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oh4hv.png[/img]
Korasi spec: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tks4X.png[/img]
I will be adding pictures of the skilling soon![/b]
And all the other Orical X v2 features and pictures...

item.title: Orical X v3 - New updates!
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“killemquick0, post:40, topic:402307”]Nice updates bro, I can bets test and help with just about anything you throw at me. will you give this one to me, or sell it to me?, conidering I payed rs gold for V2 with pathfinding fixed and was working on the bugs.

i also plan on hosting this. beats the hell out of soulsplit.

Recent bug fixes and updates:

fixed unjail and jail playerheight. * c.heightLevel = 0; *
fixed altars and bank stalls disappearing on death
fixed curse prayer on duel arena victory
fixed unarmed combat attack styles training wrong stats
fixed curse prayer drain, prayer glow, and effect end after prayer points run out
fixed unarmed combat attack styles
fixed pathfinding
fixed d claw model, animation, gfx, and int
fixed torva ints
fixed noted items
fixed custom whips
fixed invisible black on items reverted back, caused random black triangles
fixed donor stairs and doors to stop non donors from entering
fixed god robes, god armors, colored robes, primal armor and weapons, custom armor and weapons, elegant, skeleton armor, promethium, virtus, pernix, and ancient ceremonial robes ints and cases.

TODO List - current bugs:

crafting
fix GWD bugs
fix warrior guild bugs
fix zamorak robes
fix Jad
fix SOL animation
fix weapon poison “Applying poison damage.” fail l0l
fix invisible skeletons
fix zamorak spear
fix emotes
fix gem stall
fix lunar spellbook
Can’t attack gargoyles
add stats to custom items
add item requirements to custom items
fix dragon claw spec and animations
fix makeover mage to include all options.
Fix quick run button.
fix fishbowl helm d hally and mace
add cases and ints to fix unwearable/weildable items
make the wilderness level go away when you exit the wilderness
change “Xp Lock” text
fix deposit all
stop Nomads text from freezing
fix agility ticket dispenser[/quote]

Gl with the fixes. I’ve fixed most major bugs and all small bugs that I’ve noticed. I got some beta testers from a server that’s going to use this source to help me and they’re really good, moparscape people suck

Read full topic
